docs.snippet: GEN. STONE has been assigned a separate command to be stationed at the Point of Rocks, where it is presumed the rebels intend ultimately to establish a strong battery to intercept transportation of supplies and troops from Baltimore to the Lower...
docs.lead_paragraph: GEN. STONE has been assigned a separate command to be stationed at the Point of Rocks, where it is presumed the rebels intend ultimately to establish a strong battery to intercept transportation of supplies and troops from Baltimore to the Lower Potomac.

docs.snippet: To the Editor of the New-York Times:  In your issue of yesterday, under the head of "Food for Soldiers," you contradict a statement made by some other journal, and one which, by the way, has frequently been made, that our Army went into the battle in...
docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor of the New-York Times: In your issue of yesterday, under the head of "Food for Soldiers," you contradict a statement made by some other journal, and one which, by the way, has frequently been made, that our Army went into the battle in a half-starved condition.

docs.snippet: Congressman ELY, of New-York, is reported to be in Richmond, engaged in ditching.
docs.lead_paragraph: Congressman ELY, of New-York, is reported to be in Richmond, engaged in ditching.
